reaction medium: The CO2 reduction reaction was carried out in photocatalyst suspension system using septa-sealed glass chambers fit with flat borosilicate top window (90 transmittance for l !350 nm). Test conditions: 0.5 g photocatalyst, 3 ml of CO 2 saturated deionised H 2 O, 0.7 M Na 2 SO 3 scavenger.
